title: Announcing Adventure is Nigh! - Side Quest
description:
Today we're excited to announce a new spin-off for Adventure is Nigh called, Side Quest! Featuring a whole new cast of characters, this three episode series will premiere in October 2022! Support it and Adventure is Nigh on Patreon!

title: Building Your Own Virtual Tabletop Worlds in RPG Stories with Jack Packard
description:
Jack Packard is joined by Agis Angelomatis, the director of RPG Stories who is here to show off this new software designed to build your own virtual tabletop worlds for RPGs. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/bravealice/rpg-stories-3d-world-builder-vtt?ref=agdfgg
